pyqtlineeditprogressbar package¶

Module contents¶

PyQtLineEditProgressBar

This module subclass Qt’s QtLineEdit widget to manage a progress bar the is displayed as the background color of the QtLineEdit.

REFERENCE: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/36972132/how-to-turn-qlineedit-background-into-a-progress-bar
